member.name: T:DragonEngine.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DragonEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DragonEngine.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: F:DragonEngine.GameProperties.Instance
member.summary: The single instance of the GameProperties class, so that PropertyGrid and JsonSerializer can reference an object.

member.name: M:DragonEngine.GameProperties.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new GameProperties instance and overwrites the previous one.
